title: Don't let this one get away! 2 BR, 2 BA. Prime Conyers location
posting_body: ['Woodland Trace', 'show contact info', 'Unit Details:', '2-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Footage:', '975 sq ft |', 'Rental Rates:', '$1580/Month!', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month', 'Apartment Features:', '✓ Breakfast Bar', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Oven/Range', '✓ Spacious Closets', '✓ Storage Units', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Views', '✓ Window Coverings', '✓ Air Conditioning and Heating', '✓ Fireplaces in Select Units', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Individual Climate Control', '✓ Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '✓ Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '✓ Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '✓ Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '✓ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'About Our Community:', "The living spaces at Woodland Trace Atlanta are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Woodland Trace Atlanta.", "You'll love living in the Conyers location!", 'Wonderful Amenities:', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Freeway Access', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Porch', '✓ Short Term Lease', '✓ Storage Space', '✓ Sundeck', '✓ Tennis Court', '✓ Valet Trash', '✓ 2 Community Playgrounds', '✓ Coffee Concierge', '✓ Controlled Gated Access', '✓ Courtesy Patrol', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '1669 Iris Drive SE', 'Conyers, GA 30013', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '77AE677FD89C423E']
